name: Wizard Hunt
description:
Wizard Hunt

An elven heroine has to hunt down an evil wizard.

Ludum Dare

This is our entry to the 50th Ludum Dare gamejam. We, a two person team, created all of the assets, excluding the fonts and Music. The theme this time was "Delay the inevitable".

In our game you play an elven archer that has to hunt down an evil Wizard.

How to play

Controls:  

  • Move with W, A, S, D
  • Jump/Double-Jump with Space
  • Aim and shoot with your Mouse
  • You can charge your attacks to do more damage

Programming by Timur Bahadir. Art by Anja Dannenberg. Sounds by the both of us.

We used music from some sounds packs we purchased
